title: Bug 14531Unable to use JarPackager headless
description: Beginning with the 04/23 Integration build, I am unable to utilize theJarPackager in a headless environment. Specifically, I have defined my own Anttasks which perform operations including jar packaging.The problem is in JarFileExportOperation.getDirtyEditors(Shell parent). Is itpossible to accept null for parent and have the method just return an emptyarray?
